question: Which of the following is considered as the founder of the Ujjaini Satrapa?
explanation: Castana or Shastana or Chastana is considered the founder of the Ujjaini Satrapa. Chastana is believed to have won a battle against Saatvahanas. Â Chastana used 3 scripts in his coins: Greek, Kharoshthi and Brahami.
